Understate: The claim may understate the number of jobs that are actually staying at the Carrier manufacturing plant in Indiana.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support or evidence to back up the statement that less than half of the jobs are staying.
Problematic assumption: The claim may make the assumption that all jobs at the Carrier plant were at risk of being moved to Mexico, which may not be accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or factors that contribute to the number of jobs saved or lost at the plant, such as the closure of another Indiana plant owned by Carrier's parent company.
